snippet: As a family campaigned for a thorough murder investigation, an undercover officer was recording the details of their personal lives, progress and decisions.
abstract: British inquiry discloses that undercover officers spied on parents of Stephen Lawrence, young black man who was killed by group of whites in London in 1993, as they campaigned for investigation of their son's killing; findings deal a damaging blow to the prestige of a police force currently facing several accusations.
lead_paragraph: As a family campaigned for a thorough murder investigation, an undercover officer was recording the details of their personal lives, progress and decisions.

headline.main: Decades After London Racial Killing, Inquiry Shows Police Spied on Victim’s Parents
headline.print_headline: Decades After London Racial Killing, Inquiry Shows Police Spied on Victim’s Parents
